header.title: Welcome to the...
header.intro_msg: Welcome to the unofficial official webpage for the Victoria Junior College Choir. In this website, there is a repository of batch information, songs and other cool stuff that you can peruse. Enjoy!

sections.title: Creator's Message
sections.content: Hang in there, life threw a curveball but you'll get back on track soon! Hoping for good things to come in 2021!
